name: Ruben Attacks
description:
STORY: Ruben Attacks v0.2.5 Story:

You are 7 years old, you have a dog named Joannie who is 4 years old. You also have a dog named Ruben that you just bought today at the pet market. He always wants to play with his toy! Its bed time but you don't want to sleep yet so your mother lets you stay up for about 20 more minutes. The more you explore your dark, creepy, and disturbing house, the more you find evidence that your new dog might be evil...

Ruben Attacks v0.2.6 Story:

After you escape your house you are very tired so you ask somebody were you can sleep, suddenly you woke up in your bedroom wearing your PJ's after the talk. Then your old dog that died a few years back comes back to the world to play.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys or W,A,S,D to walk 

You learn the rest of the controls later on!
